title: 【临时工搬运】重头戏！帝国城市-Imperial City
author: 筒子
txt_content:
本帖最后由 __Tong__ 于 2015-4-17 15:00 编辑 

重头戏！帝国城市Imperial City

[paper]作者原话[paper]IMPORTANT: please note that this project will not be updated here anymore because we have left the site. The reason is that all the individual projects we had posted over 18 months have been suddenly removed by the moderation without a word of consideration for the work done, on the grounds that they would duplicate this project (even though they actually do not appear on this page because there is not enough space for more images). Apparently, the fact that we offer the possibility to download the city makes it impossible to create a single other page on the site to present it, regardless of the size or quality of the project. So I estimate that our future creations in the city cannot be properly presented here, and I see no reason to remain exposed much longer to the rudeness of some of the moderators (not all of them) in the future.
[book]简单翻译[book]注意：这张地图已经不会在这里更新，因为我们已经离开了这里原因好像是一些审核的问题下面是本人自己的评价以及搬运的原因[diamond_gem]搬运理由[diamond_gem]这个地图没有什么搬运的理由，这里面任何一个大型建筑单独拿出来都是一个精华虽然是12年的老图，但是我目前还没有见到有哪个图有这么大气，有这么多的建筑以前也有一个人搬了，哪个好像就是刷分被永久禁言的版主，而且他的帖子图全挂下载地址也是国外的，要翻墙过去的话还需要你搬运？于是我搬运过来造福大家了[red_music_disc]视频欣赏[red_music_disc]这次多了一个视频欣赏呢http://player.youku.com/player.php/sid/XNTM4NjI4ODg0/v.swf
[painting]图片欣赏[painting]

[board]作者信息[board]*点击图片跳转作者个人详细介绍*
更多搬运建筑请到：【临时工搬运】索引贴去寻找
